import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import destination from '../assets/destination.svg'; import home from '../assets/warehouse.svg' import moment from 'moment'; import Delivery from './delivery'; function Table(props) { const apiData = props.data; const delivery = props.data.length>0?props.data[0]["scan"]: []; let line = { position: 'absolute', zIndex: -1, top: 20, bottom: deliverys.length>0?170 - deliverys.length*35:170 - delivery.length*35, borderLeft: '2px dashed rgb(12, 228, 48)' }; return (
{delivery.map((item,index) => ( )) }
{apiData.map((item,index) => ( item.scan? setDelivery(item.scan):[]}> ))}
AWB NUMBER TRANSPORTER SOURCE DESTINATION BRAND START DATE ETD STATUS
#{item.awbno} {item.carrier} {item.from} {item.to} {item.carrier} {moment.utc(item.pickup_date).local().format("DD/MM/YYYY")} {item.extra_fields?moment.utc(item.extra_fields.expected_delivery_date).local().format("DD/MM/YYYY"):""} {item.current_status}
); } export default Table;
